attributes.action: Ensure that Armed Forces Ministers will have had served in the Armed forces at senior level and have combat experience.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Too many of these ministers have no military backgrounds, are keen to save money for areas to suit election gains, are prepared to send the Forces into face saving situations, are also prepared to use them as cheaper labour when various sections of the public sector are not prepared to work. These ministers have no idea of how the Armed Forces are expected to operate at their beck and call
